JOB DESCRIPTIONS

Available jobs:

  • Cloud Engineer

  • Software Developer

Cloud Engineer

SALARY

Annually:

$110,000 - $130,000

REFERENCE NUMBER

SB472

POSITION TITLE

Junior Cloud Engineer

Who you will report to

Senior Cloud Engineer

Mr. Gary Cheeseburger


IT Department, Cubicle C3301, 2nd Floor

Description

Our company is seeking dedicated Junior Cloud Engineers to join our ever-growing team and work with our IT and Engineering department to troubleshoot, maintain, optimize our organization's cloud-based infrastructure. As a cloud engineer, you will work behind the scenes to keep the machine running smoothly.

Responsibilities

  • Create, design, maintain, and deploy optimized cloud-based systems
  • Implement the best security practices for the organization's cloud systems to protect sensitive data. This includes things such as:
    1. Enforcing security such as encryption, identity verification
    2. Continuously monitor and look for possible security vulnerabilities
    3. Ensuring compliance with regular industry standards
    4. Enforcing data protection policies, mitigating risks and keeping customers' trust
  • Ensuring maximal efficiency in data storage, including keeping all sensitive data safe and secure.
  • Proactively review the company cloud systems and make improvements accordingly, or alternatively give feedback on possible vulnerabilities
  • Working with IT and risk management teams in developing disaster recovery plans and emergency contingencies to ensure all data is backed up correctly in case of emergency or disruptions to business operations
  • Maintaining and monitoring the health and security of the cloud infrastructure

Essential Requirements

These are non-negotiable requirements that you must fulfil in order to be taken into consideration by our company.

  • Bachelor's Degree in IT
  • Has previous experiences and sufficient knowledge in IT skills and cloud services
  • Has a sufficient cloud certification
  • Ability in programming, knowledge about programming
  • The ability to communicate, collaborate and cooperate with others efficiently

Preferred Requirements

These are optional qualifications that our company would encourage our job applicants to have for a better chance of hire. We will prioritize those with these qualifications over those who do not meet these requirements.

  • Previous work experiences (practical experiences like internships)
  • Extensive knowledge and prior experiences using AWS, Google Cloud, Azure
  • Knowledge and prior experiences of using programming languages such as C++, C#, JavaScript, Python

Software Developer

SALARY

Annually:

$80,000 - $100,000

REFERENCE NUMBER

AP5D7

POSITION TITLE

Senior Software

Development Engineer

Who you will report to

Chief Software Engineer

Mr. Phil Bigshoe


IT Department, Office D059, 3rd Floor

Description

Our company is seeking dedicated Junior Cloud Engineers to join our ever-growing team and work with our IT and Engineering department to troubleshoot, maintain, optimize our organization's cloud-based infrastructure. As a cloud engineer, you will work behind the scenes to keep the machine running smoothly.

Responsibilities

  • Create, design, maintain, and deploy optimized cloud-based systems
  • Implement the best security practices for the organization's cloud systems to protect sensitive data. This includes things such as:
    1. Enforcing security such as encryption, identity verification
    2. Continuously monitor and look for possible security vulnerabilities
    3. Ensuring compliance with regular industry standards
    4. Enforcing data protection policies, mitigating risks and keeping customers' trust
  • Ensuring maximal efficiency in data storage, including keeping all sensitive data safe and secure.
  • Proactively review the company cloud systems and make improvements accordingly, or alternatively give feedback on possible vulnerabilities
  • Working with IT and risk management teams in developing disaster recovery plans and emergency contingencies to ensure all data is backed up correctly in case of emergency or disruptions to business operations
  • Maintaining and monitoring the health and security of the cloud infrastructure

Essential Requirements

These are non-negotiable requirements that you must fulfil in order to be taken into consideration by our company.

  • Bachelor's Degree in IT
  • Has previous experiences and sufficient knowledge in IT skills and cloud services
  • Has a sufficient cloud certification
  • Ability in programming, knowledge about programming
  • The ability to communicate, collaborate and cooperate with others efficiently
  • Analytical skills within the field

Preferred Requirements

These are optional qualifications that our company would encourage our job applicants to have for a better chance of hire. We will prioritize those with these qualifications over those who do not meet these requirements.

  • Previous work experiences (practical experiences like internships)
  • Extensive knowledge and prior experiences using AWS, Google Cloud, Azure
